EmailTemplate.description: Updated CSC Survey Email for Dedicated
EmailTemplate.name: CSC - Survey - Dedicated
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Customer Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are very excited to have you as a client and value your feedback. We're committed to continually improving the quality of the services and products we provide to you.
Please take 2 minutes to respond to this short survey. This will give us a great idea about your on-boarding experience with Yodle.
Please help us reach our goal of making your experience with Yodle a success. Thank you!
Click the link below to take the survey: http://survey.clicktools.com/go?iv=1g43pznsled1b&q1={!Case.Id}&q10={!Account.Id}
Paul Bascobert President, Client Services
